title: How to Install a Pandora Battery in a Sony PSP Unit

steps.headline: Open the package that contains the pandora battery.
Open the sony PSP battery device.
Load the copper side facing you into the device.
Plug the PSP into the power source.

text: Open the package that contains the pandora battery.  Unplug the sony PSP.  Have the copper side down.  Open the sony PSP battery device.  Load the copper side facing you into the device.  Close the PSP battery device.  Plug the PSP into the power source.  Click on button.  Play.
